rules.title: Question?
rules.body: Everything you say must end in a question mark? With an upward inflection?

rules.title: Foreigner
rules.body: You must speak in an accent.

rules.title: Medusa
rules.body: You cannot make eye contact with anyone.

rules.title: Narcissus
rules.body: Everyone (including yourself) must compliment you before they drink.

rules.title: Head Lice
rules.body: You cannot touch your head

rules.title: Choo Choo
rules.body: You must pump your arms back and forth like the spokes on a train every time you laugh.

rules.title: Middle Man
rules.body: You cannot address anyone directly.

rules.title: #YOLO
rules.body: Every sentence must begin with 'Yo,'

rules.title: The Ke$ha Rule Rule
rules.body: You must repeat the last word of every sentence sentence.

rules.title: Buffalo
rules.body: You cannot drink with your dominant hand.

rules.title: Double Fist
rules.body: You must drink with two hands.

rules.title: Back Problems
rules.body: Your head must be below another player's at all times.

rules.title: Toothless
rules.body: You cannot reveal your teeth.

rules.title: Caveman
rules.body: You may not use words more than one syllable.

rules.title: Sainted
rules.body: You are to be referred to as a Saint.

rules.title: Knighted
rules.body: You are to be referred to as Sir or Dame.

rules.title: Foul Mouth
rules.body: You must curse in every sentence.

rules.title: Bad at Names
rules.body: You must avoid mentioning anyone's name.

rules.title: Liquid Cooled
rules.body: The floor is lava. Drink constantly while touching it.

rules.title: CB Radio
rules.body: Every sentence must end with 'Over'

rules.title: Touchy Feely
rules.body: You must remain in physical contact with another player at all times.

rules.title: Angry Man
rules.body: You must insult another player every time you drink.

rules.title: DJ Salute
rules.body: You must salute any time the song changes.

rules.title: Penguin Gloves
rules.body: You must hold your hands flat like flippers.

rules.title: Mr Hat
rules.body: You must wear a hat, or a hat-like device, on your head.

rules.title: Partners In Crime
rules.body: Choose another person. Every time they drink, you do too.

rules.title: Nudist
rules.body: Undress until you are tied for the least clothing at the party.

rules.title: Cotton Fists
rules.body: Wrap a piece of clothing around your hand. This counts as you wearing it.

rules.title: Trump Hands
rules.body: You may only use your index and pointer finger to grab things.

rules.title: Trumpets
rules.body: When someone mentions the name of a country, raise your drink. The last person to raise must finish it.
